contract allows users to stake tokens in various tiers, each with unique durations, reward multipliers, and early withdrawal penalties. It integrates with AccessControl, EmergencyController, and an OracleIntegration. Rewards are paid out in the same token being staked. The contract is upgradeable and inherits from EmergencyAwareBase.","errors":{"AmountIsZero()":[{"details":"Thrown when a required amount is zero where it should not params.duration: The staking duration for this tier in seconds.
params.earlyWithdrawalPenalty: The penalty for early unstaking in basis points.
params.rewardMultiplier: The reward multiplier for this tier in basis points.

returns.tierId: The ID of the newly created tier.

params.positionId: The ID of the staking position.

checkEmergencyStatus(bytes4).details: This function is typically called by modifiers within the implementing contract to guard functions.

params.operation: The 4-byte function selector of the operation being attempted.

returns.allowed: A boolean indicating if the operation is permitted.

params.positionId: The ID of the user's staking position.

returns.amountClaimed: The amount of reward tokens claimed.

constructor.details: Disables the regular constructor to make the contract upgradeable.

emergencyShutdown(uint8).details: The implementing contract defines how it should react to different emergency levels. For example, it might pause itself or enable emergency withdrawals.

params.emergencyLevel: The system-wide emergency level being broadcast by the controller.

returns.successFlag: A boolean indicating if the shutdown was handled successfully.

params.positionId: The ID of the user's staking position to withdraw.

returns.amountWithdrawn: The amount of tokens returned to the user after the emergency penalty.

returns.aprBps: The base APR in basis points.

returns.isEnabled: True if emergency withdrawal is enabled.

params.positionId: The ID of the staking position.

returns.endTimeVal: The timestamp when the stake matures.
returns.isActiveFlag: True if the position is active.
returns.lastClaimTimeVal: The timestamp of the last reward claim.
returns.startTimeVal: The timestamp when the stake was created.
returns.tierIdVal: The ID of the staking tier.

returns._0: The address of the staking token.

returns.durationVal: The staking duration of the tier.
returns.earlyWithdrawalPenaltyVal: The early withdrawal penalty of the tier.
returns.isActive: True if the tier is active.
returns.rewardMultiplierVal: The reward multiplier of the tier.

params.adminAddr_: The initial owner/admin of the contract.
params.initialBaseAPRBps_: The initial base Annual Percentage Rate in basis points.
params.initialMaxPositionsPerUser_: The maximum number of active staking positions a user can have.
params.minStakeDurationVal_: The minimum duration for any staking tier.
params.oracleIntegrationAddr_: Address of the OracleIntegration contract (can be address(0)).
params.stakingTokenAddress_: The address of the pREWA token to be staked.

returns.isPausedStatus: A boolean indicating if the contract is considered to be in a paused state.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

returns.successFlag: True if the operation was successful.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

recoverTokens(address,uint256).details: Cannot be used to recover the staking token. Only callable by the owner.

params.tokenAddrRec: The address of the token to recover.

returns.successFlag: A boolean indicating if the operation was successful.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.newBaseAPRBps: The new base APR in basis points.

returns.success: True if the operation was successful.

setEmergencyController(address).details: This function should be access-controlled within the implementing contract (e.g., `onlyOwner`).

params.controller: The address of the new EmergencyController.

returns.successFlag: A boolean indicating if the operation was successful.

params.enabled: Whether to enable or disable emergency withdrawals.
params.penalty: The penalty to apply on emergency withdrawals in basis points.

returns.successFlag: True if the operation was successful.

params.maxPositions: The new maximum number of positions.

returns.successFlag: True if the operation was successful.

params.duration: The new minimum duration in seconds.

returns.successFlag: True if the operation was successful.

params.oracleAddr: The address of the new OracleIntegration contract.

returns.successFlag: A boolean indicating if the operation was successful.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to stake.
params.tierId: The ID of the staking tier.

returns.positionId: The ID of the newly created staking position.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

returns.successFlag: True if the operation was successful.

params.positionId: The ID of the user's staking position to unstake.

returns.amountUnstaked: The amount of tokens returned to the user after any penalties.

params.active: The new active status for the tier.
params.duration: The new staking duration for the tier.
params.earlyWithdrawalPenalty: The new early withdrawal penalty for the tier.
params.rewardMultiplier: The new reward multiplier for the tier.
params.tierId: The ID of the tier to update.

returns.successFlag: True if the operation was successful.

accessControl().notice: The contract that controls roles and permissions.

calculateRewards(address,uint256).notice: Calculates the pending rewards for a specific staking position.

checkEmergencyStatus(bytes4).notice: Checks if a specific operation is allowed based on the current emergency status.

claimRewards(uint256).notice: Claims pending rewards for a specific staking position without unstaking.

emergencyController().notice: The central controller for system-wide emergency states.

emergencyShutdown(uint8).notice: A function to be called by the EmergencyController to trigger a state change in the contract.

emergencyWithdraw(uint256).notice: Allows a user to withdraw their staked tokens during an emergency.

getBaseAnnualPercentageRate().notice: Gets the current base APR for staking rewards.

getEmergencyController().notice: Returns the address of the EmergencyController managing this contract.

getEmergencyWithdrawalSettings().notice: Gets the current emergency withdrawal settings.

getMaxPositionsPerUser().notice: Gets the maximum number of active staking positions per user.

getPositionCount(address).notice: Gets the total number of staking positions for a user.

getStakingPosition(address,uint256).notice: Retrieves the details of a specific staking position.

getStakingTokenAddress().notice: Gets the address of the token being staked.

getTierInfo(uint256).notice: Retrieves information about a specific staking tier.

isEmergencyPaused().notice: Checks if the contract is effectively paused, either locally or by the global EmergencyController.

isStakingPaused().notice: Checks if the staking contract is currently paused.

oracleIntegration().notice: The contract that provides reliable price feeds (optional).

recoverTokens(address,uint256).notice: Recovers ERC20 tokens mistakenly sent to this contract.

setBaseAnnualPercentageRate(uint256).notice: Sets the base Annual Percentage Rate for staking rewards.

setEmergencyController(address).notice: Sets or updates the address of the EmergencyController.

setMaxPositionsPerUser(uint256).notice: Sets the maximum number of active staking positions a user can have.

setMinStakeDuration(uint256).notice: Sets the minimum staking duration for all tiers.

stake(uint256,uint256).notice: Stakes a specified amount of tokens into a chosen tier.

totalStaked().notice: Gets the total amount of tokens staked in the contract.

unstake(uint256).notice: Unstakes a position, claims any pending rewards, and returns the principal tokens.

updateTier(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: Updates an existing staking tier's parameters.
